title: What Happened to Larry Alan?
description: Judson Heart, like all of us, has some regrets. Not his he writes for a daily newspaper. Maybe his he eats lunch alone. Definitely his he hasnâ€™t had much luck in the love department. With his ten-year reunion approaching, those regrets intensify as he begins to recall a turbulent final year of high school. But with the help of three elderly, mystical strangers and a surprising assignment to interview a prison inmate, Jud may get the chance to make some changes. All he needs to do is find out what happened to Larry Alan.
author: Dawn Kimberly Johnson
